channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- Spectrum Power 4
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- Spectrum Power 4

item.title: CVE-2022-23312|2024-08-03T03:36:20.385Z -- siemens -- spectrum%20power%204
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Spectrum Power 4 (All versions < V4.70 SP9 Security Patch 1). The integrated web application "Online Help" in affected product contains a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability that could be exploited if unsuspecting users are tricked into accessing a malicious link.
